channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Job-hugging’ in this economy? Here’s how it could cost you.

item.title: Opendoor’s stock may be drawing in more bearish bets against it, even as it keeps rising. Here’s why.
item.description: Shares of heavily shorted Opendoor Technologies are continuing their rally, putting the stock on pace to extend its winning streak to seven days.

item.title: Weight loss has become the hottest new Chinese consumer craze
item.description: A wellness boom is reshaping China, from gyms and diet apps to new injectable drugs — and spending habits.
